title: Spiritual Weapon
content:
erate, Greatsword: Lacerate Halberd: Lacerate Maul: Concussive Smash Spear: Piercing Strike Trident: Piercing Strike The weapon is Immune to Psychic and Poison damage, and Resistant to all other Damage Types. Deals 1d8 + 1 damage + Spellcasting Modifier Force Level: Lvl 2 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Bonus Action Range: 18m Duration: 10 turns Saving Throw: None

It gets access to Weapon Actions typical to the weapon class you choose:

Greataxe: Lacerate, Greatsword: Lacerate Halb
